meanings.definition: Remove quotation marks from (a quoted passage).
meanings.sent1: She was unquoting the text to make it look more natural.
meanings.sent2: Remember to unquote the dialogue before submitting your essay.
meanings.sent3: The teacher accidentally unquoted the wrong section, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: Unquoting the words revealed a deeper meaning hidden within the text.
meanings.sent5: The process of unquoting can help improve the flow of your writing.

meanings.definition: The act of removing quotation marks from a quoted passage.
meanings.sent1: His unquoting of the text made it easier to read.
meanings.sent2: The unquoting of the passage clarified the author's intent.
meanings.sent3: The unquoting process can sometimes lead to humorous misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: Her unquoting of the poem brought out its true essence.
meanings.sent5: The unquoting in the document highlighted the importance of the original words.
